name: DiceFight
description:
A GameJam game about hitting enemy dice with the correct side of your die to throw them out of bounds. The higher the difference, the higher the impact!

It is my first entry into any GameJam. Good luck everyone.

I run out of time to put assets inside the game, so I'll post them here for now:

3D Dice, victorzzt on OpenGameArt

5GameUiKits Pack, don't actually know, there is no readme in the archive :<

60GameCursors pack, don't actually know, there is no readme in the archive :<

Impact, qubodup on OpenGameArt

Some UE Quixel Materials
